name: competitions_matches
description:
This is a sub-function API for tool zeus_api.
Tool description: This API returns information on the 5 major European football leagues.
Get standings, matches, scorers and more.
API description: Retrieves the current matches for a specified league and season using the Zeus API.

year.description: The season year to retrieve matches for. Defaults to '2021'.

round.description: The round number of the matches to retrieve. Defaults to '24'.
